turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up with my primary care physician, Dr. Ramirez. Can you help me?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, I can certainly help with that. I can access Dr. Ramirez's appointment schedule. To get started, can you please provide your date of birth and the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my date of birth is 03/15/1985. The reason for the visit is a general check-up.  I'd prefer a morning appointment if possible. And can you tell me, how far out are appointments typically scheduled?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you.  Currently, Dr. Ramirez's earliest availability for a general check-up is in about three weeks. There's an opening on the 20th of next month at 9:00 AM. Would that work for you? Also, do you need any vaccinations during this check-up?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Three weeks out? Seriously? That's frustrating! I guess I'll take it. The 20th at 9 am is fine.  And no, I don't need any vaccinations. Also, what's the clinic's policy on late arrivals?  I'm terrible at being on time.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, your appointment is confirmed for the 20th at 9:00 AM with Dr. Ramirez. Regarding the late arrival policy, I am unable to provide you with that information at this time, but I can provide the clinic's phone number so you can inquire directly. The number is 555-1212. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
